  • Constructor Details

    • ProductDao

      public ProductDao(String databaseName)
      Initialises a ProductDao to access the specified database name
      Parameters:
      databaseName - The name of the MySQL database to be accessed (this database should be running on localhost and listening on port 3306).

  • Method Details

    • getAllProducts

      public List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Returns a list of Product objects based on information in the database. All product entries in the Products table are selected from the database and stored as Product objects in a List.
      Specified by:
      getAllProducts in interface ProductDaoInterface
      Returns:
      The List of all product entries in the Product table. This List may be empty where no products are present in the database.

    • getProductByCode

      public Product getProductByCode(String code)
      Searches for a product entry matching the code supplied as a parameter.
      Specified by:
      getProductByCode in interface ProductDaoInterface
      Parameters:
      code - The id of the Product to be found in the database.
      Returns:
      The Product contained in the database matching the supplied product code, or null otherwise.

    • getProductsWithGreaterQuantity

      public List<Product> getProductsWithGreaterQuantity(int quantity)
      Searches for any product entries with a higher quantity in stock than the specified amount.
      Specified by:
      getProductsWithGreaterQuantity in interface ProductDaoInterface
      Parameters:
      quantity - The minimum quantity in stock to be checked for.
      Returns:
      The List of all product entries in the Product table This List may be empty where no products are present in the database with a quantity greater than the specified value.

    • updateProductName

      public int updateProductName(String productCode, String newProductName)
      Amends the name of any product in the database matching the specified code.
      Specified by:
      updateProductName in interface ProductDaoInterface
      Parameters:
      productCode - The product code of the Product to be renamed (this is a unique value)
      newProductName - The new name to assign to the Product being changed
      Returns:
      The number of product entries changed in the Product table.
